pages.name: Sununicorn
pages.text: Accessed with the $(l:gotchard/items/ride_chemy_cards#unicon_ride_chemy_card)Unicon$(/l) or $(l:gotchard/items/ride_chemy_cards#the_sun_ride_chemy_card)The Sun$(/l) Ride Chemy Card (both cards must be in your inventory)

pages.title: Kamen Rider Majade
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Gotchard (2023, TV show)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:gotchard/devices/alchemisdriver)Alchemisdriver$(/l)$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Jump Boost

pages.name: Mooncerberus

pages.title: Kamen Rider Majade
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Gotchard (2023, TV show)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:gotchard/devices/alchemisdriver)Alchemisdriver$(/l)$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Jump Boost

pages.name: Twilight Majade
pages.text: Accessed with the $(l:gotchard/items/ride_chemy_cards#twilight_unicon_ride_chemy_card)Twilight Unicon$(/l) or $(l:gotchard/items/ride_chemy_cards#twilight_the_sun_ride_chemy_card)Twilight The Sun$(/l) Ride Chemy Card (both cards must be in your inventory)

pages.title: Kamen Rider Majade
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Gotchard (2023, TV show)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:gotchard/devices/alchemisdriver)Alchemisdriver$(/l)$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Jump Boost$(li)Strength III$(li)Speed III$(li)Regeneration III$(li)Night Vision$(li)Resistance III$(li)Fire Resistance$(li)Anti Poison$(li)Fire Fist
